root.name: ATV Offroad Fury 4
root.description: SummaryATV Offroad Fury 4 is the latest entry in the ATV Offroad Fury franchise developed by Climax Group. It was released on October 31st, 2006 for the Playstation 2. ATV Offroad Fury 4 is preceded ATV Offroad Fury 3.FeaturesATV Offroad Fury 4 features MX Bikes, Trophy Trucks, Dune Buggies, and the preexistent ATVs. With additions such as 50 championships, improved graphics, improved online capabilities, and 60 offroad tracks.While riding on an MX Bike, more tricks are possible than on an ATV. While you can do tricks on both MX Bikes and ATV's, you can't do any tricks on Trophy Trucks or Dune Buggies, other than getting a bunch of air on a jump.ATV Offroad Fury 4 has five minigames, Ice Hockey, Scavenger Hunt, King Of The Hill, Bowling, and Ring Of Fire.
